DOC.detailed_description: 1. transperineal pelvic floor ultrasound apply submit 120 woman `` primiparae '' ( 40 woman normal vaginal delivery ) , ( 40 woman urgent cesarean section ) , ( 40 woman elective cesarean section ) , early postpartum period ( 48 72 ) hour postpartum , evaluate levator ani morphology . 2. answer validate female sexual function index ( F.S.F.I ) three month postpartum period case submit ultrasound .
